colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES DPAL DUR KHROD KYI BDAG PO'I BSKANG GSO DNGOS GRUB 'BAR BA'I 'OD CES BYA BA 'DI NI SNGON GLAD PA GSER GLING GI BLA MA BKA' BCU BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BSKUL BAR MDZAD, DRAG KHUGS GNYER PA BLO BZANG RDO RJES 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
